3 bed link-detached house for sale

London Road West, Bath BA1

  • Sold subject to contract
Guide price

£550,000

Agent information View Agent profile

Wentworth Estate Agents

Agent address,
25 Monmouth Street, Bath, BA1 2AP

Property details

  • 3 bedrooms
  • 2 bathrooms
  • 2 reception rooms

Features

  • Link Detached Period House
  • 1819 Sq Ft Of Accommodation
  • Chain Free
  • Immaculately Present Throughout
  • Flexible Accommodation
  • Driveway Parking & Garaging
  • Well Established, Pretty Gardens
  • Countryside Views

Listing view statistics

Last 30 days: 24 page views

Since listed: 734 page views

Description

Situated in Lower Swainswick to the east of Bath city centre is 'Avonland', this is a period property with three bedrooms and south facing mature gardens, garaging, private parking and views. The property is offered to the market with No Onward Chain.

Location

The property is conveniently situated to the East of the World Heritage City of Bath, close to beautiful open countryside and within easy walking distance to a range of amenities in Batheaston, including an excellent primary school, doctor’s surgery, dentist, chemist, veterinary practice, post office, general convenience store and several, superb country pubs. Bath City Centre offers a full range of fine dining, boutique shops, The Theatre Royal and the architecturally unique Thermae Spa. There are transport links to London either from junction 18 of the M4 which lies to the north of the city or by rail from Bath Spa railway station to London Paddington (Approximately 90 minutes).

Internal Description

Once inside the property there is a light, open dining hall with stairs leading up to the first floor with storage cupboard under. To the left there is a bay fronted sitting room with feature gas fire that leads through to a wet room with shower, WC and hand basin. The sitting room could also be used as a bedroom if required, with en-suite wet room. From the wet room a door leads through to a utility room which has a hand basin, plumbing for a washer and dryer and a door to the external patio area. The ground floor accommodation is completed by the kitchen/dining/family room. The kitchen is fully fitted with a range of wall and base units, an inset sink unit, mixer taps, single drainer, built in double oven, five ring gas hob, dishwasher and freestanding fridge and freezer. The kitchen area also benefits from a lovely bay window providing the ideal space for a table and chairs and double doors which open out onto the front patio. There is also a family snug area within this space with a gas fire and door that takes you to the right-hand side of the property

On the first floor there is a landing with stairs leading up to the second floor, which also provides access to the top floor accommodation. On this floor you will find the master suite and bedroom two. The master suite comprises of an en-suite bathroom with jacuzzi bath, walk in shower cubicle, sauna, wash hand basin and separate WC. There is also a dressing area with built in cupboards that lead through to the master bedroom with a vaulted ceiling and dual aspect windows which allow the light to flood through the room. Bedroom two is also a double with views out over the garden, and beyond, along with an under-stair cupboard and
hand basin.

On the second floor there is a third and final bedroom that has velux windows with views to the rear, storage cupboard and an en-suite wet room with shower, WC and wash hand basin.

External Description

The property has a well-established south facing terraced garden bound by walls with extensive lighting. At the bottom of the garden there is driveway parking leading to a large detached garage with up and over door. To the rear of the garage there is a further room currently being used as additional storage, but could also be used as a home office with views out onto the garden. From here there is a level area laid to lawn, with a seating area off to the left. A path and steps lead up to the first terrace where you have a further seating area with views to the south. There are a range of aesthetically placed well stocked flower beds and borders throughout the gardens as well as two mature grape vines, and it is finished with a large patio area which offers the ideal al-fresco dining area in the warmer months.

Agents Note

The Property Misdescriptions Act 1991. The Agent has not tested any apparatus, equipment, fixtures and fittings or services and so cannot verify that they are in working order or fit for the purpose. A Buyer must obtain verification from their Legal Advisor or Surveyor. Stated measurements are approximate and any floor plans for guidance only. References to the tenure of a property are based on information supplied by the Seller. The Agent has not had sight of the title documents and a Buyer must obtain verification from their Legal Advisor.

Guide price

Close dialog

Guide Price: The “Guide Price” an indication of the seller’s minimum acceptable price at auction. The guide price can be shown in the form of a minimum and maximum price range, or as a single price figure. This is subject to change up to and including the day of the auction and will not necessarily be the final selling price at auction.

Reserve Price: The “Reserve Price” is the seller’s minimum acceptable price at auction and the figure below which the auctioneer cannot sell. This is normally set within the guide price range or within 10% of a single guide price. The reserve price is not disclosed and is subject to change up to and including the day of the auction.

    Wessex Water

Water costs explained

Water consumption is based on average water usage for the predicted occupancy of the property based on the number of bedrooms.
Total annual consumption (in cubic meters) is then averaged into a monthly cost.
Note: If you have 2 separate suppliers for water and sewage, you may receive 2 separate bills.

Council tax

Close dialog
Estimated cost

£192 per month

When paid over 10 months

The breakdown

  • Council tax band E £192 per month

    Bath and North East Somerset

Council tax explained

The Council Tax cost displayed is based on the council tax band and on the basis of 2 adults living at the property. The monthly cost shown excludes any discounts and is rounded to the nearest pound.
Full information on Council Tax discount entitlements can be found on the Gov.UK's website.
